import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { from, Subscription } from 'rxjs'; import { WorkoutService } from '../workout.service'; import { Exerceise } from './exercise'; @Component({ templateUrl: './workout-details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./workout-details.component.css'] }) export class WorkoutDetailsComponent { pageTitle = 'Product Detail'; errorMessage = ''; exercise: Exerceise[] = [] exercisedGrouped: Exerceise[] =[] constructor(private route: ActivatedRoute, private router: Router, private workoutService: WorkoutService) { } ngOnInit(): void { const param = this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('id'); if (param) { const id = +param; this.getExercise(id); } this.exercise = this.exercise.sort((a,b) => a.category > b.category ? 1 : -1); } getExercise(id: number): void { this.workoutService.getExercises(id).subscribe({ next: exercise => this.exercise = exercise, error: err => this.errorMessage = err }); } onBack(): void { this.router.navigate(['/workouts']); } }
